question: The ISSF World Cup was scheduled to be held in Changwon city located in which country?
explanation:
The ISSF World Cup was scheduled to be held in Changwon, South Korea, from April 16 to 27. It was recently announced that the tournament has been postponed due to restrictions imposed to curb the spread of COVID-19 pandemic.
Last week, the Indian team withdrew from the tournament because of South Korea's mandatory two-week quarantine rules, which would come in the way of the shooters' training.
